original_text: Israel's people offer sacrifices to me, and they eat the meat from those sacrifices. But their sacrifices do not please me. I know that they are guilty of wicked things. Soon I will punish them for their sins. They will have to return to Egypt. Israel's people offer sacrifices to me, and they eat the meat from those sacrifices. But their sacrifices do not please me. I know that they are guilty of wicked things. Soon I will punish them for their sins. They will have to return to Egypt. Soon I will punish them for their sins. They will have to return to Egypt. Israel's people offer sacrifices to me, and they eat the meat from those sacrifices. But their sacrifices do not please me. I know that they are guilty of wicked things. Soon I will punish them for their sins. They will have to return to Egypt. Israel's people offer sacrifices to me,
korean_text: 그들이 내게 고기를 제물로 드리고 먹을지라도 여호와는 그것을 기뻐하지 아니하고 이제 그들의 죄악을 기억하여 그 죄를 벌하리니 그들은 애굽으로 다시 가리라

sentences.original_text: Israel's people offer sacrifices to me
and they eat the meat from those sacrifices
But their sacrifices do not please me
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그들의 제물은 나를 기쁘게 하지 못한다

sentences.original_text: I know that they are guilty of wicked things
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들이 악한 행위로 죄책이 있음을 안다

sentences.original_text: Soon I will punish them for their sins
sentences.korean_translation: 곧 내가 그들의 죄로 그들을 벌하리라

sentences.original_text: They will have to return to Egypt
